text: Mary Jane Veloso (born 1984/85) is a Filipino maid. She was arrested and sentenced to death for apparently smuggling 2.6 kg of heroin into Indonesia. She was denied a pardon many times. She also said that she was innocent, and worked in Malaysia and Dubai, United Arab Emirates. At the end of 2024, Mary Jane Veloso was repatriated to the Philippines after negotiations between the two countries. Veloso was born in Nueva Ecija, Luzon. She was also once married and has two children. ==References== Category:1980s births Category:Living people Category:Drug traffickers Category:Filipino criminals Category:People from Nueva Ecija
title: Mary Jane Veloso
